about_the_game:
Have you ever dreamed of defeating an army of robots? Low Batt is the game for you. In this exhilarating, fast-paced shooting adventure, you assume the role of Andy, a friendly robot on a mission to retrieve batteries for his robo-dog, fiercely guarded by the nefarious corporation L.E.A.D. Industries. Explore a vibrant and captivating futuristic factory, meeting intriguing characters and dispatching hordes of guards in the most inventive ways.

A FORMIDABLE ARSENAL AT YOUR DISPOSAL:

From Roomba-like robots to mines and even the occasional nuclear weapon, Andy is well-equipped and can utilize various traps and environmental hazards, such as ground traps or electrified floors, to handle the moderately well-trained elite corps of guards.

AN UNFORGETTABLE JOURNEY FOR ALL AGES:

In Low Batt, you'll encounter unforgettable characters and a bustling robot factory teeming with life. Amidst the frantic combat, take breaks to uncover amusing secrets, anecdotes, and bizarre situations in which the workers of L.E.A.D. Industries find themselves entangled.

JOIN ANDY AND TRY THE LOW BATT EARLY ACCESS!

KEY FEATURES:

  • Explore 2 unique and distinct sci-fi areas
  • Experience nice, polished and creative combat
  • Fight against multiple types of unique enemies
  • Meet fun and memorable NPC
  • Use machinery and traps to your advantage

short_description: Step into the thrilling world of Low Batt, a heart-pounding Top Down Shooter that pits you against the formidable security forces of L.E.A.D. Industries. Navigate through intense challenges requiring a blend of skill and strength and embark on an epic robotic adventure to rescue your robo-dog.
